transcript.text: This call may be recorded for quality and training purposes.
Thanks for calling Pivot Point Orthopedics. Part of pretty good AI. Am I speaking with Felix?
Yes, that's me.
Got it. Can you please provide your date of birth?
Got It Felix.
Okay.
What can I assist you with today? Felix, are you calling about an appointment medication insurance or something else?
I want to schedule an appointment.
Sure, what type of appointment would you like to schedule? For example, a new patient consultation, follow-up consultation, procedure or physical therapy session.
I would like to schedule a new patient consultation.
Got it. Would you like to see a specific provider or are you open to the next available appointment?
I am open to the next available appointment.

Honest to let me check the next available times for a new patient consultation 1 moment while I fetch the openings, there are no openings for a new patient consultation in the next week would you like to look for available times later in March or try a different month?
Can I look for available times later in March?
Sure, I'll check for openings later in March.
Sure thing, I'm here.
Great. I'll search for available. New patient consultation appointment starting in March 1st. While I check the schedule the next available. New patient, PS,
Sure.
The earliest slot is at 9:00 a.m. with Dr. Adam Bricker.
I would like to book that appointment.
Just to confirm you'd like to book a new patient consultation with Dr. Adam Bricker on Thursday March 5th at 9:00 a.m. is that correct?
I asked for March 1st, not March 5th.
I understand there are no available appointments on March 1st but the soonest opening is March 5th. Would you like to book March 5th at 9:00 a.m., or should I check for other dates later in March?
I will book March 5th at 9:00 a.m. with Dr. Adam Bricker.
Got it. What is the main reason for your visit? So I can include it with your appointment booking.
I have pain in my knee.
Understood.
Thank you so much for your help. I'll call back if I need anything. Goodbye.
